basics.name: Christopher Havens
basics.label: Mathematician
basics.summary: A number theorist, cryptography researcher, and currently incarcerated.

work.name: University of California, Los Angeles
work.summary: Conducted research in cryptography under the supervision of Dr. Amit Sahai

volunteer.summary: Founded the Prison Mathematics Project to bring mathematical mentorship to more incarcerted students.

Math And Art In Prison: A Collaborative Eﬀort Across The Ocean

publications.name: Diophantine Analysis around [1,2,3,…]
